column4: 'ello.  I am having problems with ubuntu when i boot.  I think i may have to do with optimus/bumblebee.  Does anyone have any experience with bumblebee?
from what ive seen in here.. lots of bad experiences with it.
the only thing i know about bumble/optimus - is that i plan on making sure my next laptop does NOT use it..
no idea. I just see a dozen people in here weekly (or more) with issues with it.
